1583480.name: Until We Die Demo
1583480.description:
Until We Die is a base defense strategy game. Your base is the subway station, it's underground part. You'll have to defend it against all sorts of things, brought in by meteorites.



The demo comprises the introductory part of the game with one big attack on the player’s station at the end, as well a tutorial and one difficulty mode—“Seasoned”. This is a reasonably hard option for players with experience playing games of this genre. A description of the details of the difficulty mode can be found in the game itself.
